channel.title: For all of those who need help with No-ip
channel.description:
For all of those who need help with No-ip hosting!....
I am not really big to this but i can host no-ip so....
First of all you need to download a server to host! click [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]Here[/url] And find any server that you find suitable for you! Now that we have downloaded a server, we can open up our folder to get the server working right click the compiler and change it to: [code]@echo off title rapeScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause[/code] note:[i]Change the java to what yours is...[/i]
Now open up your "run server.bat and change it to: [code]@echo off title p00nscape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code]
note:[i]Change the java to what yours is...[/i]
I do not use my compiler or my runserver i use a runserver&compiler:
[code]@echo off COLOR 0c title Narbscape Compile + Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java" server pause [/code]
Now that our compilers are working your server is ready for updating but now to do no-ip, First of all we need a domain, you can pay or you can get one for free, go to www.no-ip.com and register, now that we have registered we can login and go to "manage" on the left hand side of our screen and click "add a host" now we can pick a server name and what ip we want! if an ip is already taken then don't moan lol. Now go to downloads and download no-ip DUC and then it will update your no-ip host so you can host it!
We have a perfect server, a perfect no-ip host, BUT WAIT now we need no-ip to work, go to your start panel and right click "my computer" and click "properties" Now at the top you will see loads of tabs, click "advanced" Then at the bottem of this tab you will see "enviroment variables" click this.
Now on the first box click "new" and add this for the variable name use "[code]CLASSPATH[/code]" and for the variable value use "[code]Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.[/code] " now that box is done we need to do the other box! they are not the same but the variables are, for the name click "CLASSPATH" for the value click "[code].;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\lib\ext\QTJava.zip[/code]" now put your server on, And if it doesn't work then your computer is a cookie head.
~Str by zammy~

item.title: For all of those who need help with No-ip
item.dc:creator: @9d_n_1_n_e 9d n 1 n e
item.description:
@9d_n_1_n_e wrote:

zerokainin:

my compiler dosent work and players cant run my server [508] when i run my compiler it says yuou do no have java files for this compiler to compile. and my friend said i have to make tha CLASSPATH and i did but still players cant get on[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2009, 05:01:54 pm[/size][hr]and my java is java 6 update 13 the latest one out

stop bumping old topics noob.

Read full topic

item.title: For all of those who need help with No-ip
item.dc:creator: @RaZoR36 RaZoR36
item.description:
@RaZoR36 wrote:

[quote=“zerokainin, post:3, topic:50609”]my compiler dosent work and players cant run my server [508] when i run my compiler it says yuou do no have java files for this compiler to compile. and my friend said i have to make tha CLASSPATH and i did but still players cant get on[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2009, 05:01:54 pm[/size][hr]and my java is java 6 update 13 the latest one out[/quote] Maybe Use This As A Compiler:

@echo off color 0a title [You Title Here] "c:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac" -cp . *.java echo Succesfully Compiled! pause
If that doesnt work use this one:

@echo off color 0a title [Your title here] c:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_13\bin\javac" -cp . *.java echo Succesfully Compiled! pause And IF That Doesnt Work You Probably Downloaded The Wrong Java Like Me Make Sure You Typed FULL Version Of Java Not A Crappy One, You Can Also Try Uninstalling And Re-Installing Java.

Read full topic
item.source: For all of those who need help with No-ip

item.title: For all of those who need help with No-ip
item.dc:creator: @Prozon Prozon
item.description:
@Prozon wrote:

Thanks!

  When I decided to come back to private servers, I got all the files I needed but couldnt find the code I needed for the compiler. Thanks to you.. I have it! So many people tried to solve my problem with.. "Go download java" Well, isnt that a good idea you noobs. Anyway, thanks a bunch, couldnt get my compiler to work. Didnt read the rest of the post, just got the code I needed. I'm sure its very helpful.

Good job!

Read full topic
item.source: For all of those who need help with No-ip

item.title: For all of those who need help with No-ip
item.dc:creator: @str_by_zammy str by zammy
item.description:
@str_by_zammy wrote:

For all of those who need help with No-ip hosting!..

I am not really big to this but i can host no-ip so…

First of all you need to download a server to host! click Here
And find any server that you find suitable for you! Now that we have downloaded a server, we can open up our folder to get the server working right click the compiler and change it to:

@echo off title rapeScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause
note:Change the java to what yours is…

Now open up your "run server.bat and change it to:

@echo off title p00nscape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

note:Change the java to what yours is…

I do not use my compiler or my runserver i use a runserver&compiler:

@echo off COLOR 0c title Narbscape Compile + Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java" server pause

Now that our compilers are working your server is ready for updating but now to do no-ip, First of all we need a domain, you can pay or you can get one for free, go to www.no-ip.com and register, now that we have registered we can login and go to “manage” on the left hand side of our screen and click “add a host” now we can pick a server name and what ip we want! if an ip is already taken then don’t moan lol.
Now go to downloads and download no-ip DUC and then it will update your no-ip host so you can host it!

We have a perfect server, a perfect no-ip host, BUT WAIT now we need no-ip to work, go to your start panel and right click “my computer” and click “properties” Now at the top you will see loads of tabs, click “advanced” Then at the bottem of this tab you will see “enviroment variables” click this.

Now on the first box click “new” and add this for the variable name use “CLASSPATH” and for the variable value use "Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;. " now that box is done we need to do the other box! they are not the same but the variables are, for the name click “CLASSPATH” for the value click
“.;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\lib\ext\QTJava.zip” now put your server on, And if it doesn’t work then your computer is a cookie head.

~Str by zammy~
